storyInfo: Having settled into Rhodes Island life along with her comrades, Istina receives an unexpected letter from Leithanien.

attributes.content: Umm... which one should I wear?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: This one's sort of tight, but this one has kind of short sleeves. This is the first time I've ever had so much trouble picking clothes!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I used to just wear whatever I found...
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: How about this one, perhaps?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh... I remember this. Rosa bought it for me... I bet Mama and Papa would say it's pretty, wouldn't they?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Nff, unf... mmrgh...
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: L... Lada, I think you might have it on backwards? Your hood's ended up in front...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Here, I'll turn it around for you.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hehe. Thanks, Istina!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Honestly.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: You're finally seeing your Mama and Papa after so long, and yet you're still so clumsy as you've always been. Will this even do?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I know! It's okay. It's all okay as long as I can see them!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I've recorded all my stories with you and the girls in my books, and I'm going to tell them every single one! And I took a lot of pictures of life at Rhodes! My photo album's thiiis thick!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Also... this! It's a present for them.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Cookie molds...? What shapes are these supposed to be...?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hehe, they're all my dearest friends! This one reading is you, Istina, and this one with the headphones is Zima, and the one with the wonky hat is Rosa...
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Er, and this horned one...? It can't be Rosalind, can it?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: No, that one's Uncle Matterhorn... He spent forever teaching me when I was learning how to make molds, so I put him into the set too!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Leto's is this one with the honey pot!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: All quite detailed, too. You've put a lot of care into these, Lada... Er, don't you have a design for yourself?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hm? If Mama and Papa get to see me and everything... then would they need a mold for me?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: They'll have the real Gummy with them in the flesh, so they won't mind!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Oh, yeah... Istina, what presents are you giving your Mama and Papa?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Ah... me?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I... haven't been through the process yet.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: You see, suddenly learning they're still alive, and that we can meet again on top of that... It just strikes me as slightly unreal.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Unreal...? I don't get it...
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: When I heard they found my parents, I got so happy I couldn't sleep for days, you know!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I'm very happy too... and very excited, and I'd love to take to them right this instant. But...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Our fraught flight from Chernobog, all the things we went through... then our coming to Rhodes Island, and all after that—we've spent so long living life together.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: What news we had of them before never, in the end, went anywhere. If... just if, this time is the same...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: *sigh*.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Never mind that. We've found them, so... no overthinking it. Let's just sort ourselves out.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Lada.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Lada! Open the damn door!
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Whoa, whoa, whoa, keep it down, wait... Come on, what's this about? Are you just gonna go until you smash the thing open?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Sonya...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Sonya!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Allow me.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Lada, would you kindly open the door? Everyone's very worried about you.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: You've gone almost two days without eating anything... If you keep depriving yourself of sleep like this until your mother and father do come to visit you, you won't even have the energy to greet them. That's no way to...
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: The dormitory door remains shut. Not a whisper comes. Not a sound answers.
Enough, Natalya.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: The HR guys said they double-checked and everything. The word on Lada's parents was just another bust. This isn't even the first time they've screwed her hopes up.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: All of us know how goddamned lucky we were to survive Chernobog. Finding our parents and crap... I just think the sooner we get real, the better.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: No more giving Lada false hope like that.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Lada's 'rents were off in some other city doing research, right? So we haven't pinned them down yet, whatever. Sooner or later we're gonna find them!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: And anyway, didn't you get word on your folks too, Anna?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: But given Lada's circumstances, I'm supposing the information about my parents was just as inaccurate.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: ...Anna.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: It's fine. Even if they are mistaken, it's not as if it means much to me... I suppose.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Enough, no need to give me those looks. I can tell you're worried I'll take it as badly as Lada has.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: But look how long we've kept ourselves going already. Even a guarantee that we'd never see our parents again wouldn't turn our lives upside down, would it?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: *breathes*... Lada, it's okay.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: If you want to stay inside, then please, rest well, and get a good night's sleep.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: If you feel restless, come find me. We can take some more pictures... If your album is all full up, we'll buy a new one.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Or maybe we could draw together? We'll draw those gingerbread monsters we read about, or maybe that huge house the likes of which we'd never imagined, to fit all five of us...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: With a boxing ring, so Sonya and Rosalind can fight to their hearts' content. And a kitchen with an extra-large oven, so Natalya and I can bake cakes with you, and decorate them all in brand new ways.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: And remember when you told me, you'd build me a room to fit mountains and mountains of books—
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: *huff*... *huff*... Finally. Here you are...
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: Istina, letter for you...
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: For me?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Yep, it just arrived. And the Messenger specifically asked us to get it to you, ASAP...
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: (The envelope seems fresh; I can still discern traces of overapplied glue on the seal. The inscribed Ursine seems somewhat familiar...)
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: (The flourish and elegance on this Ursine hand. Something tells me I've seen this before, on the papers of my father's desk, and the annotations in the books by my mother's pillow.)
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: (Strange. My heart's suddenly pounding...)
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: (Can it be? It can't, can it...?)
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Is this letter... from my parents?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: We've inspected, audited and scrutinized, and we can absolutely, positively guarantee. This time, it all lines up.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: Rhodes Island's established contact with your parents at a Leithanian branch office... This letter was mailed by them, firsthand.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: Ah... ah—
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: What follows is my 65th recording of self-diagnosis and treatment of trauma via in vivo exposure therapy.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: *exhale*—
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I'm not dreaming after all.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: My parents—are still alive. They're in Leithanien.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: They wrote to me that whenever I'm ready, I can go back to living with them anytime.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I'd honestly... never given much thought to the question. Of whether they were alive or dead...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Every time the notion came to me, I'd divert my attention as fast as I could.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I was so sure that they were working at the Government House, and central Chernobog had taken the worst of the damage...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: What happened to them had always been plain as day, to me. Frittering energy on getting to the bottom of it would've been meaningless.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: (Deep breath)
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Under the supposition that I could never reunite with my parents again, I stayed aboard Rhodes Island, together with Sonya's group.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: We took Rhodes Island as a new beginning.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I even drew up a thorough daily schedule for the long-term, so that we could accustom ourselves to our new lives quicker, and so that we could break ourselves free from that nightmare sooner.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: We've been studying here, working here, taking part in what missions we can here, and we've been doing well for ourselves.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: We've finally been able to... dream a little, about our future...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: But... now I've gotten word from my parents out of nowhere. And they're suddenly telling me, I can leave everything behind right now and go back to them, be back with them, just like how it used to be.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: What should I do? Should I leave? Leave Rhodes Island, and my USSG comrades...?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: If perhaps Lada, or Sonya had been the first to find their families again... what would they have done?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Lada's always missed her own Mama and Papa so much, and Sonya may not seem to care, but she, too...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Right... a letter. I can write back to them for now.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Tell them I'm not ready to go, for the time being... that I want to stay here.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Come in—
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Anna, you in for dinner? Rosalind says she's treating—
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: ...You writing a letter?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: To your parents?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Sonya, does this part sound right to you? I'll read it out loud...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I don't wanna hear it.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: I don't get it is the thing, Anna. If you've got something to tell 'em, just say it to their faces.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Me, all I'd write is—'Got it. Wait till I get back.'
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: There, done! Wasn't that easy?!
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: I don't have plans to go to Leithanien at the moment. That's what I'm mulling over how to phrase.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: You're not going?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Blyat'! Are you kidding me!?!
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I was helping to sort out the Reception Room visitor files over the next two days, and I still need to write those few book reviews I promised Heidi...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: And Rhodes Island's curriculum does demand. There may be no exams, but we won't get away with any less than a good grasp of the knowledge.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: And further, didn't we agree that Instructor Dobermann would take us through mission drills next week? The USSG still has plenty on its roadmap for the next six months of operator training, and I imagine...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Yeah, is this about Lada?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: If it is, you really don't gotta bother.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Lada's... always wanted to see her parents, but we've never found them, and now I've found mine before she...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: The hell does it matter that you found yours first? You don't wanna see 'em?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: ...Of course I do. But—coming to Rhodes Island marked the point where I accepted we could never go back to our old lives.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: What we should do in the now, where we should go in the future; those have been the persistent factors in my head...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: And going back, becoming the apple of my mother's and father's eyes again, the secondary school student—it never crossed my mind.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: In fact, how could it?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Knowing they're alive, and doing well, that's enough for me. That's enough to keep me happy for a very long time.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I can maintain a mail correspondence with them for now. We can show each other how we're doing through photographs... and then come vacation, I'll go and see them.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: ...Anna.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: I'm gonna be honest, I've never you this confused and screwed up worrying. Not even in Peterheim.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: I mean, look at yourself. Who'd guess you just got the biggest, best news of your life?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Doesn't matter what you pick in the end—parents, education, work, our future... All of them matter.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: But you've gotta figure out, to you, what's most important of all, right now.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: And you don't have to worry about us like that. We're all doing fine on Rhodes.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Look at Lada. She holed up in her room for days, but today, she's gone to the kitchen to tinker out new veggie bakes with Hibiscus.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: I passed by the cafeteria just now, and they were laughing the roof off! Lucky I could sprint away...
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Pfft.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: What's so funny? You wanna try their thing? Green pepper and horned melon in molten piroshki? That sound good to you?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: No, something just strikes me different about you today, Sonya. It's like... you're much more talkative, perhaps?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: The Sonya I used to know would've torn up my letter and dragged me off in a rush... with probably nothing to add but a 'quit overthinking, it's a pain in the ass.'
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: You've learned how to comfort people.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: ...Goddammit.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Wait... the hell? What are you tearing it up yourself for?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: I'm taking your advice.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I'm considering, first and foremost, what's most important to me.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hey, hey, no backsies! We agreed this was the last round, right? And I dunno if you saw, but I clearly won!
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Hah, hahahhh *belch*... Sonya, just drink, yeah? That glass, that you just drank before, iiiit doesn't count!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Cause now, now you, haven't drunk this one... so now you, gotta drink it! Urp... *belch*!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Rosalind!
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: I'm freaking done here, this is gonna go on forever! Next time, don't care what she says, we don't let her buy that much honey...
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Natalya, you drink with her.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Me...? Well, I'm not too fond of honey, you see... I don't even add any to my tea.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Huh? Whaaat, don't tell me you've NEVER tried chugging honey before?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: C'mere—
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: W—Wait a seconnmmphh...
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: (Somehow, I feel like this 'farewell party' for me was just a pretense for them to make a ruckus.)
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: (Still... this isn't too bad, is it?)
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Istina... here, these are for you!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Eh? For me?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Weren't you going to give these molds to your Mama and Papa?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh, umm... I don't get to see them now, do I...? So giving them to you works!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: But... won't you have nothing to give the next time you hear about them?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hehe! I can make new ones then, it won't take that long!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Look!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: It's carrying a frying pan... is this you, Lada?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Mmhm! I made it brand-new! Now there's molds for all five of us.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: When you go home, you can take Gummy and Zima and everyone else with you!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Lada...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Thank you. Once I'm back, I'll have a little present for you too.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Wait... Anna, you're coming back?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Erm... I am.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I'm staying with my parents for a while, and then I'll return.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Huh? Hey, you found your family, go start a new life with them, what are you coming back to... urp—*hic*.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Rosalind, it's not that simple...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Is returning to their side going to begin life anew, just like that?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Is it not?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: You can't all think that me leaving Rhodes Island is the better option?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: (Nod)
attributes.name: Rosa & Gummy

attributes.content: Not necessarily the better option, but it is at least an additional one.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is a fine place, and gave us shelter. But it's because we had nowhere else to go that it became our best option.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: But, Anna, things are now different for you.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: And besides, wouldn't you imagine that we've all since steeled ourselves for someone to inevitably leave?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Even if we do have to say goodbye someday, I'll still be protecting us, down to the last girl.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: ...Anna.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: I guess you might still be worrying about our feelings. But honestly, you finding your family makes us all pretty happy.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Yeah! You got to find your Mama and Papa, so Gummy's gonna find hers one day too!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: And I think it's gonna be even better for you if you leave Rhodes Island!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Umm, it's like...
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Well... if I stay here, then I can probably become an amazing cook, and Zima and Leto and Rosa can all be generals in the field...
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: But you'd probably wanna go back to your Mama and Papa, so you can go back to school and study, right?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I bet your parents are gonna have your acceptance stuff all filed by the time you hit Leithanien. All you gotta do is put on your backpack and head to school, just like back in Chernobog.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: And you can live like none of that crap ever happened.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: How can I possibly pretend that...?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Sonya. Does starting over really become the best choice in your eyes, the moment you get the opportunity?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: ...Ugh.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Well, not for me.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Then all the same, it isn't for me, either.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: My decision is made. I'll go there, I'll see how my parents are doing, I'll see if age has taken its toll.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: And... I'll likely tell them how dark it was for me in Peterheim, and how I and a group of dependable friends pulled ourselves through it.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: And of course, I'll tell them about Rhodes Island. Lada and I have taken countless photos, enough to let them picture our lives here.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: And then... I want to ask them and find out, after however they escaped Chernobog, however they reached Leithanien... after all this time, did they ever try searching for me?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Anna, this'll take up so much of the time you have.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: You can stay with your parents in your new home, and work out your questions as things come. Nothing's asking you to rush back so quickly.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Mm. All of this can be solved as it comes. But none of it is the crux of what I'm going back for.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: (Deep breath)
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: What's most important—is that I convince them, talk them into letting me back to Rhodes Island, letting me stay with my comrades.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: So... we looked over that old lady's credentials, and noticed she had the surname Morozova, AND she came in from Chernobog!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Driver

attributes.content: And searching for someone in Leithanien who's from Chernobog, that's a back-breaker.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Driver

attributes.content: Luckily, or maybe it was just our dang luck, they were living around the Rhodes Island branch office and came right in to see us that day, because Mrs. Morozova had a bit of a toothache, and they thought our office was a dentist...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Driver

attributes.content: ...and then we learned. Most everyone else treated the events at Peterheim Middle School as... a lost cause.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Driver

attributes.content: But your mom and dad, they never gave up on searching for you.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Driver

attributes.content: ...*exhale*.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: So, are they doing well...? What is the place they're living like? Do they have new jobs?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Mmm, they're good enough. The office's doc has sharp skills, so your mom's tooth won't be aching for the time being at least.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Driver

attributes.content: Once you're there, you can find out the rest for yourself. Take your time.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Driver

attributes.content: Alright, I see. Thank you so much for going out of your way to take me.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Don't mention it, you're pretty much on the way. I make regular trips from the landship to branches all over, 'porting goods, linking up with missions.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Driver

attributes.content: And hey, you're not the first I've chauffeured from the landship.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Driver

attributes.content: Then...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Could you tell me how many you've sent... back to the landship?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Driver

attributes.content: This is... Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I've returned here again, as I hoped to.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: On the road to Leithanien, I imagined my reunion with my parents under countless different circumstances... imagined how to convey my decision to them, and show how I'd grown...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: But the moment I met them, all the imagining I'd done was pointless. We hugged, we leaned on each other, and then we told one another how our lives had been while we were apart... It was all so natural.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: The day I arrived, Papa insisted he'd cook, wanting to make me shchi to bring back the taste of home. After going through several markets, we never found the yellow onions, so we had to buy wild ones to substitute...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: It was my first time eating wild onion shchi, and the taste wasn't unbearable... just somewhat pungent.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: They loved Lada's gift, and we used the molds to bake cookies, an endless amount. We spent days eating them...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I mentioned Lada's food was delicious, and Papa seemed to take it personally, insisting he'd find some time to compete with her...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh, right. After the stories I told them and the photos I brought, they know every member of the USSG by name now.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: What I didn't expect was how wholeheartedly they'd agree to let me stay aboard Rhodes Island. They insisted on giving me an absurd amount of Leithanian things too, to take back to my friends.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: They've all been shared out among the USSG now. You could say... 'polished off' without a trace.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Everything's gone so smoothly. Maybe even a little too smoothly...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: (Deep breath)
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Well, then. 'Self-diagnosis and treatment' no. 66 ends here.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Surely enough, I do mind a little.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: My parents understand and support my decision, but they've expressed their worries and hangups too. They even raised a potential concern I'd never considered before.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: 'What if, in the future, the Self-Government's members all leave Rhodes Island and choose to go their separate ways, to separate places? What do you think you'll do?'
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I'll... will I go to Leithanien? Or continue staying aboard Rhodes Island? Or maybe...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: At least, for now, my parents are highly supportive, and my comrades are still by my side. As for what follows... from here on, I'll want to work out my future plans.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Huh? Where's my comms terminal?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: There it is... what was it doing under my bed?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: If I recall correctly... Closure's contact is...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Waagh... why ring now of all times...?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hello? Ah... it's Closure.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: The camcorder? Yes, it was me who borrowed it... No, no need! I'm already done, I'll return it in just a moment...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Say, Closure...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: That thing you mentioned before. The one about helping out in the filing room... I'm very thankful you trust me so much.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: If it's okay... I'm willing to give it a try.
attributes.name: Istina
